title: Syrian refugees - major hosting countries worldwide in 2018
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of admitted Syrian refugees in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of admitted Syrian refugees is appeared to be the highest at Country Turkey and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The highest Country Turkey has 3590274.0 more Number of admitted Syrian refugees than the lowest Country Netherlands.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of admitted Syrian refugees in the y axis.
The Number of admitted Syrian refugees is highest at Country Turkey and lowest at Country Netherlands.

The Number of admitted Syrian refugees is appeared to be the highest at Country Turkey and lowest at Country Netherlands.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of admitted Syrian refugees in the y axis.
The maximum Number of admitted Syrian refugees 3622366.0 is found at Country Turkey and the minimum is found at Netherlands where Country is 32092.0.
The minimum Country Netherlands has got 112.87 times less Number of admitted Syrian refugees than the maximum Country Turkey.
Number of admitted Syrian refugees at Country Turkey is 3622366.0 , second place is Lebanon at 944181.0, and thirdly is Jordan at 676283.0.
The Country Netherlands tends to be 5.62 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 6444408.0.
